job_description:
• The ideal candidate will have a solid background in Python development, network packet research and inspection, and knowledge of OT technologies such as SCADA and PLC.
• Sr Advanced Embedded Software Engineer – Innovative Navigation Locations Krakow, Malopolskie, Poland Posting Dates08/21/2025 We have an opportunity for an experienced Embedded Software Engineer to join us at Honeywell Aerospace in Krakow.
• You will help create breakthrough innovations that will ensure Honeywell’s leadership position and take a technical leadership role in creating system solutions for the SGN (Sensing, Guidance and Navigation) team that will meet the long-term evolving needs of our customers.
• Sr Advanced Embedded Software Engineer – Communication, Navigation and Surveillance Systems Locations Krakow, Malopolskie, Poland (Hybrid) Posting Dates06/17/2025 We have an opportunity for an experienced Embedded Software Engineer to join us at Honeywell Aerospace in Krakow.
• You will help create breakthrough innovations that will ensure Honeywell’s leadership position and take a technical leadership role in creating system solutions for the SGN (Sensing, Guidance and Navigation) team that will meet the long-term evolving needs of our customers.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
